name: Baiter Master
description:
There's nothing like a relaxing fishing trip, is there? Just you, your boat, your trusty rod, and the peckish denizens of a freshwater oasis. And if that freshwater oasis happens to be the site of a nuclear meltdown thirty years ago? Well, that's fine too. A little radiation never hurt nobody.

This game can be played with only one hand, your left one! Use A and D to tilt your boat left and right (the water can get a little choppy, so you don't want to fall over) and spacebar controls your line. 

Navigate the menu with A and D and press spacebar to select an option! Frustrated? Press R to reset your game!

Made in under 72 hours for Mini Jam 76: Radiation.

Yes, this game has a silly name, but no, it contains no inappropriate content whatsoever. Just a fishing game. 

A game by

  • Seth Burchfield
  • Jackson Moore
  • Charles Painter
  • Cooper Garvin
